title: 6.4 Master Challenge 1
question:
Consider a 2D array where the number of rows and columns are equal. Write a Java program to print the sum of the diagonal elements.
Note: The left diagonal elements consist of the same row and column index.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
